website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, high-quality wok for a low price. An excellent deal.
pros: Earns high marks from native Asian chefs
Can go in the oven up to 350°F
cons: May require a wok ring to aid stability

customer_reviews.title: Great but my family now hates me.
customer_reviews.text: I got this and works wonderfully. The Teflon surface is extremely slick and nothing sticks to it. I had to take a long wok to contemplate its greatness. I was woking in Memphis but my wife prefers woks on the beach. It is a lonely path to wok once your spouse gets tired of puns. My kids won’t look at me. My wife hasn’t spoken to me in days. Don’t worry I am sure it will all wok out.
customer_reviews.author: JBrookie

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other t-fal items
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of t-fal and never seen coat faded in any of my t-fal products. So I was shocked when the coat of this wok faded only after two months, plus I used it at most twice a week. Do not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yuqi

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick coating non-existent  after a several months
customer_reviews.text: This non-stick wok worked perfectly the first couple of months. It was large enough to cook almost anything and the non-stick coating really helped. After about 4 months of usage, the non-stick coating no longer works. Seems like anything I cook on it automatically gets stuck on it even with plenty of oil. I have other T-fal products and non of them have gotten this bad so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Season the non stick twice prior for best results
customer_reviews.text: I've used T-fal non stick cookware for decades, if you that it well it will last a long time. Very happy with the wok, I was using a 14 inch pan but a got a lot of chopped vegetables spreading out on to the glass cook top and burning.
customer_reviews.author: A. Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Wok is not what the description says
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge Tfal fan. However, this wok is very different from the pictures and description. 1) There is no flat base to evenly distribute heat. 2) There is no red heat spot to indicate it is ready for cooking. Not happy I paid $45 for something that was basically a false promise. I’d be mollified if they were to reach out and replace it with the item they claim in their photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Kool Ducati

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for simple stir frys and was pleasantly surprised how well it's made. In a couple weeks, I've already made various stir frys 5 times. I've also used it 8 or more times to blacken tuna steaks and the bowl sides help reduce side splatter. I don't know where they measure this because it is much larger than 14 inches. So easy to clean, I don't miss using the old hand hammered wok. I reccomend wooden wok spoons/tools.
customer_reviews.author: J Stephens

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The surface of this scratches too easily.. I am not satisfied with this product.. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: A N.

customer_reviews.title: Big size
customer_reviews.text: Great price, always wanted to buy a big wok for this price . Finally I was happy I found it. I don’t use it everyday, food does not stick to wok. It is very easy to clean. I have cooked noodles, fried rice and so on and food cooks fast. As a home cook I often use this pan. The only draw back is it’s too heavy . The food cooked makes the wok even more heavy . I use both hands to lift the wok.
customer_reviews.author: Vindhya Prasad

customer_reviews.title: this is my third one
customer_reviews.text: maybe I abuse them a bit, because they always end up flaking a bit over time, even with hand washing. But for the price, just replace it. I always use a silicone turner, but mixing with it in the pan eventually seems to scrape some of the coating. I mix and bake meatloaf in the oven in this pan with the max temp of 350 F. It's basically a big mixing bowl you can cook with, so you don't need to clean a bowl in addition to the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Bonifacio

customer_reviews.title: Best wok for eclectic stove
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one after my first exactly same wok has some scratch. Best wok on the market if you don’t know / do not want to maintain a traditional Chinese iron wok. If you use electric stove, this is perfect for you because traditional Chinese wok need ‘real fire’ to burn in and maintain. If you have gas stove, a traditional wok may work for you but you need to do the homework on how to burn in / maintain it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: After having used one previously, a wok has become an essential kitchen item for me. It allows for cooking large quantities of food without making a mess or spilling items out of the pan. It is perfect for stir fry as in the attached photo, but it can be used for many other dishes as well. This item from T-fal is sturdy and the nonstick aspect makes cooking with it a breeze. Woks can get incredibly expensive, so finding this one at such a low price was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Looks well made and cooking well so far
customer_reviews.text: Normally my dislike for non-stick pans is how quickly the non-stick coating wears down. I'm concerned of the non-stick slowly wearing off and leaching into my food. But supposedly hard anodized is better than traditional non-stick coatings so I'm hoping this one will last longer. It certainly looks like it's made better than the previous generation of the T-fal wok. The hard anodized layer seems to be all around the wok now whereas the older model had only the nonstick coating on the inner cooking side. I'm cautiously optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Big but not very good for electric cooktop
customer_reviews.text: might be too big for average people, great for those who cook a lot. If you use gas to cook, this might work fine. However, if you use electric cooktop, this might not work so well since it is not flat. only small bottom surface will be heated. Thus it will take more time to heat up. Overall, it seems to be a decent cookware if you are not using electric cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Dear MR.J

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I knew the product description said Jumbo, and goodness it lives up to it. For my needs making stir-fry and fried rice, this is the opposite of a problem! If you need to cook up some fried rice for at least three people in under 15 minutes, this will get the job done! It also cleans super-easy! Yes, it's dishwasher safe, but cleaning by hand is a snap too. If you love to cook Mongolian BBQ, stir-fry, and the like, 10/10, would definitely recommend! Also, because it's non-stick...I would strongly recommend using wood or bamboo utensils so you don't damage the non-stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Bottom heating platform too small
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the pan was like three inches in diameter. Instruction manual said I should only heat up the bottom flat portion and let heat propagate through the wok and not directly heat up elsewhere. I had the coil heating surface so I was only supposed to use the smallest coil, which has the weakest heating power. I bought the wok thinking I could do some Chinese stir fry, which requires high heating power. Not with this wok I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Durability worsen, last only nine months
customer_reviews.text: It lasts only 9 months before I have to buy it again. I expected it to last at least 12 months and then rate it as five stars. This is the only wok with such good size in Amazon. But I am looking for other brands now. Maybe it's my last time to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Take a Wok to Your Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Great Wok. Nothing sticks to the surface when cleaning. But when cooking It is easy to cook an ingredient, push it off of the bottom onto the slope, while cooking the next ingredient. The waiting items stay put while cooking until I'm ready to combine them all, at the end. I like the fact that it is very large. My wife put a decorative display which had a hook, onto the wall next to the stove. I hung this wok onto the hook, and it was attractive enough that my wive didn't notice it was there for over a week, after I pointed it out to her. Not Bad!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok, Would be Better if it comes with a Lid
customer_reviews.text: I am from Asia and I do have high standards for Wok. This wok is big enough to do any kind of stir fry, and since it’s non stick, it’s very easy to clean. High quality, very sturdy, but I take a star away because it doesn’t have a lid. I do have a lid from my previous wok, it’s not a perfect fit, but it’s good enough to use this wok for steaming food. Have been using it for a year, definitely recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good and light prefect to Chinese recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a wok to use on my glass stove top. Unlike traditional wok that have a round bottom this is flat but not fully just the very bottom is flat. So it can sit on a flat glass stove which is nice. Since the flat part is small, it retains the unique cooking space of a wok. It fit nicely on the smaller heating area of the stove. Only issue I have was to fine a cover for it. This wok do not come with a cover, you need to pick up one separately, also I would not attempt to use a normal Chinese spatula with this. Just the more gentle wooden or silicone tools.
customer_reviews.author: Yat Ho Ma

customer_reviews.title: Description gives you the wrong weight  only 2 pounds not 5 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Description says it weighs 5 pounds an actually only weighs 2 pounds Very light weight it’s a little hard to stay up straight on a regular gas stove because it is Handle heavy at all and two rounded at the bottom. I used it and I was disappointed how light weight it was I put it in for a return but I think I’m going to keep it now because I have to use again I realize how good the nonstick was and maybe the light weight will be easier to stir fry
customer_reviews.author: Harry stamer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value or the money. My first one lasted nearly 3 years and was pushed to the limits (and beyond) perhaps 3 to 4 times a week preparing meals. It finally lost it's nonstick qualities and I simply threw it into the recycle bin and bought another. At this price a new one every 3 years is quite affordable. Great wok for the money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: xrider

customer_reviews.title: Coating came off when seasoning the wok with oil!
customer_reviews.text: I never used this wok. When I washed it with soapy water and added a light coat of oil, my paper towel got grey. I even moved it to a new spot on the towel twice—still grey. Called TFal customer service and was told that it was just extra spray during processing and to wash and oil it again. I did so and...yup—the paper towel still turned grey!!! I don’t see how this coating could last if it’s already coming off before I ever used it!!!! Came yesterday, returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman Jack

customer_reviews.title: This is a great wok!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and I really love it! I was finally able to make fried rice and could mix it without food spilling out of the pan! It’s very easy to clean and while it says it’s dishwasher proof, the instructions also say to be careful that your dishwasher doesn’t discolor the pan so I’ve only hand washed it. This is a very large pan but considering it’s a wok, I’m ok with that but you do need to make sure you have the space to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Chatham

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the novice cooks!
customer_reviews.text: We're beginning to stir fry more and more at home. This pan has exceeded expectations, especially for the price. After 10 uses, it's quick to heat, easy to clean, and we haven't had anything burn or stick, yet. Highly recommend for the novice cooks on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Olson

customer_reviews.title: T-fal? More Like T-fail
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wok on the 21st of January and have used it 4 or 5 times. I have never used anything inside of it other than wooden utensils and paper towels to clean and to my surprise it didn't even last 10 days before the teflon coating has begun to peel off. After reading the fine print of their warranty this is not covered under it. I would like to request a refund but it seems like this is not going to happen, I am very displeased with this pan, it is total garbage. Save your money and invest in a different wok.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was not a very satisfying purchase. It seems lighter than the one we bought before, and it was not very steady on the stove. I am not sure it is real either as the bottom does not seem to be like what the picture shows. Also I am not sure it is new as the package was loose and there is some scratch at the bottom. A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Use it For Everything!
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing to sauté, boil, fry, simmer, cook pancakes....you name it! I don’t even care those things are not the tools intended purpose...STILL works and never disappoints. My husband originally purchased this for me as a gift and to my surprise it worked like a charm. When the bottom was scratched by my precocious daughter, I was forced to buy a new one. I love my new one just as well. I even bought my sister one after it measured up to her skepticism. Girl, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Afiat Yawatep

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged but works good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product brand new (not used) and received it with a huge, deep gash on the exterior of the pan. I was going to exchange but decided against it because of the inconvenience... The package it came in was not damaged which lead me to believe the damage occurred in the factory or maybe they accidentally sent me a used product??? Aside from this mishap the pan seems to be in great condition, works just as expected and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYoung

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wok because it was easy to clean and works very well. The only thing that I was upset about was that it didn't come with a lid but since its very big any smaller lids should work at home. Another thing that I was like about it was that it was very cheap and really worth the price. Have been using it for more than half a year.
customer_reviews.author: Min Zhen Chen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nonstick performance
customer_reviews.text: The nonstick performance is perfect! However, the bottom size (flat area) is way too small compared to the wok size, which makes it heat slowly. The huge wok also makes it not easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a Wok.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve reviewed a single thing I’ve purchased on Amazon, but this wok, especially for this price, is one of my pride and joys. It’s excellent for meal prepping large batches of food but can just as easily be used to make some eggs in the morning. It’s decently light for how large it is. Honestly, the only thing I’ve had issues with is finding a good spot to keep it, usually it just sits on my stovetop because I use it for multiple meals a day; even my roommates use it and we haven’t scratched it or found it to be any less “nonstick” than the first day I unwrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: I don’t review

customer_reviews.title: Get this wok!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love the size and ease of use and cleaning with this wok. It arrived quickly and was even delivered straight to our apartment door for a change instead of going to our leasing office, which was super nice! Exactly as described and shown.
customer_reviews.author: Twyla Smith

customer_reviews.title: imitation TFal
customer_reviews.text: O don't think I got a T-Fal. The first time I cooked and cleaned it it started getting scratched I've purchased TFal before. Never a scratch. Had if for 6yrs and passed it down to a friend. I'm disappointed. I just went by the look and the info on the description
customer_reviews.author: NikkiDV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks now and I love it. It's plenty big for what I need and its non-stick surface has worked like a charm so far. I'm not sure how long that will last but it's perfect so far. Edit: So I've had this for about 8 months now and it is still fantastic. Works like a charm and the non-stick surface still keeps everything off of it. Very happy with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: adidab14

customer_reviews.title: I change it every 2 months on average
customer_reviews.text: This pot is very easy to use. For Asians, this pot is used every day. It is evenly heated and easy to clean. These are the advantages of this pot. I've been buying it for a new one every two months. It works great, but non-stick pans generally cannot be used for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Journey

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: coat has already faded when I use less than one month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I needed a large pan for veggie/sauce/one pot dinner and things like that. We are a family of 8 and it holds enough in one batch that feeds all of us. I’ve used this a few times now and I am super happy with the size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: FzzyKttnPws

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for 4 years now, and still not a mark. Nothing sticks to them. Great for stir fry. Gteat for Boiling. Great for deep frying. My favorite pan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: You need this wok
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this wok. It's huge, durable, non-stick, and best of all it fits in the dishwasher! I use it to make literally everything - stir fry, breakfast scramble, pasta dishes, etc. If you don't have a wok yet start here.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy S.

customer_reviews.title: Big enough
customer_reviews.text: It is a good wok to use. It is big enough and not so heavy to hold. It is easy to clean and non-stick. Even it is thick enough, but it is not so heavy. The heat distribution pretty well and can be used for my gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: Icey

customer_reviews.title: Get the cheaper version
customer_reviews.text: The hard anodized version is not as good as other products in the product line. I had a few E76598 ultimate hard anodized saute pans and I love them. This one got deep scratches after first use. No bones or metal utensils in there. Get the cheaper version. I had one and it lasted a lot longer. I returned the hard anodized one and got the original version again.
customer_reviews.author: XJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband to make stir fry and he loves it he says it's easy to maneuver and so I do the dishes when he cooks I got to say it's really easy to clean up it's a little big for my kitchen sink but besides that you can easily use a napkin or paper towel and discharge all just to give you an example of how easy you can get rid of the left overs
customer_reviews.author: soy Mexican casserole

customer_reviews.title: Great large nonstick wok
customer_reviews.text: Very large won. Sides are not too high up. Fits alot of food. Does not stick. Easy to clean. Seasoned it 1 time before use and did it afterwards just like the directions say. Very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Best wok ever!
customer_reviews.text: It was time to replace my old wok and this one fit the bill. It is plenty large for a stir fry. It seems very high quality for the price. The finish is very nice and it cleans so easily. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kit-Kat's mom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wok!
customer_reviews.text: This is the main cookware I have been used for last 5 years. I currently have 6 that I purchased when it was on sale at Amazon because this type of wok lasts for about 4-6 month before light scratches start to appear which is common for most on non-stick pans. I hope the manufacturer can make improvement in following or create a new type: keep this shape of inside but make the bottom .5 to 1 inch (in diameter) larger so that it would fit induction cooktops to provide quick heat distribution. This would increase the weight but I bet a lot of customers would love it more.
customer_reviews.author: Ferryboat

customer_reviews.title: Scratches
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight and nonstick, I was very happy with this purchase. But only for less a year it was with a lot of scratches on the bottom of the wok. I have only rubber and wood spatula at home so that means that the wok is really not tough enough. I have to get rid of this wok and begin another round of search. Sign.
customer_reviews.author: cristina chen

customer_reviews.title: Versatile pan at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Used this five or six times a week as my go-to pan not only for stir-frying, but also for scrambling eggs, making stew, tomato sauce, etc ... Heats evenly and is very easy to clean. Buying a new one today as the one I bought last year has a couple of chips in the cooking surface (not covered by the "lifetime" guarantee). I always hand-washed it, because it's so big it would take up most of a rack in my dishwasher. A fairly inexpensive option that works great. Anticipate being able to use it (with proper care) for about a year before you'll need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Screenguy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is so far the best wok I have ever used!!! Good price easy to wash, non stick everything is great!!! I was so disappointed with Costco’s wok and search without any expectation. But this wok is truly great
customer_reviews.author: linkivan

customer_reviews.title: Good heat distribution and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love this non sticking wok! I wish I bought this a long time ago. Good heat distribution. Easy to clean. And you can cook a big meal with it. I’ve been using it for over 2 months and it still look brand new!
customer_reviews.author: JJShopper

customer_reviews.title: Big deep pan with lower quality T-fal surface
customer_reviews.text: Good sized pan with tall sides. Makes for a deep pan. However, surface doesn’t seem resistant to scratches and chips like other T-fal pans are. The quality seems lower. Pan also came with some small scrapes on the outer edges.
customer_reviews.author: kman583

customer_reviews.title: Wok this way
customer_reviews.text: I wear it as a hat and play on it like a drum. I even WIZZ in it. Two of the BEST things the Orientals are really skilled at... 1. Calculous 2. Designing rad fkn' woks Take it from me friend, this cooking device will WOK your world.
customer_reviews.author: null

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for low price!
customer_reviews.text: Large wok. I wasn't expecting much for the low price but it has exceeded my expectations. It is very sturdy. Handles are solid. Per some other reviews, I seasoned the pan twice and will come to do so per instructions. Only use plastic utensils to avoid scratches. I took a picture too demonstrate just how large this wok is. This is about 5 cups of Fried rice in the photo
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: This wok is perfect for my stir fries
customer_reviews.text: This wok is perfect for my stir fries. It's very sturdy and so a bit heavy but not unduly so. The nonstick surface makes it really easy to clean. It holds a lot of food at one time without spilling over or splattering. I'm looking forward to years of good use with this excellent wok.
customer_reviews.author: Dave 68

customer_reviews.title: My go-to in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This wok is a dream. Incredibly large and sturdy, and cooks food evenly and quickly. I think I use this pan more than any other now. And it can cook so much more than stir fry! You can whip together scrambled eggs, diced proteins, sauces, etc. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall. Unfortunately after just around a month of use there is already a scratch on the non-stick coating and I have only used wooden utensils while operating the wok. It has good surface contact with even a flat glass stove which great for those kinds of stoves. The manual also indicates to not use maximum heat which I find unfortunate as wok cooking usually requires very high heat. Overall it feels very well balanced than a lot of other woks and feels great to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: newboarder

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Used all the time and would just wipe clean with a paper towel. Just make sure you don't scratch it and it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C.

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick Wok
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping with good packaging and no damage. It's pretty light, and I love the non-stick feature for easy cooking and cleaning. Just wish the bottom is a bit bigger to seat fully on my stove (16" will be perfect).
customer_reviews.author: Rich Yang

customer_reviews.title: Nice wok!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned and seasoned it right away, and have been using it with my veggies. Very satisfied with the product, and at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: mantishrimp

customer_reviews.title: Thick and deep wok 👍🏻👍🏻 Must buy
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy and great product. I have not used it yet but i have used tfal products in the past. They are excellent in quality. We need to care while wash because they are non stick. This one is pretty deep and giant. My husband and i lovedddd it. Great for deep frying and chinese food 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great to cook in
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan!! So worth the buy. Easy to clean. And cooking in it is a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Fremd

customer_reviews.title: it will scratch easily. As long as you know how to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT store any other metal objects (like other pots and pans) inside of this. Due to the nonstick coating, it will scratch easily. As long as you know how to take care of it, it's a great product. It's also WAY bigger than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great wok!
customer_reviews.text: Great wok for cooking Chinese dishes! I didn't expect it to last for such a long time without any problem (almost a year)! Usually you know non-stick pans won't last long. Though it's a little bit heavy and the heat conduction is a little bit slow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my husband, who likes to cook. He absolutely loves how big this is and even started cooking more stir fry-based meals because of its versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this wok
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Love this wok. Nonstick is great for the crazy stirfry that we make with it, easy clean up. Its a big wok so make sure you have the space to store it! I use it so much I either keep it on the stove or in the oven, since I have a small apt the kitchen isn't too big.
customer_reviews.author: Leif Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: It's a wok... so no need in telling you about it. Tfal is great product and this one very easy to clean and is huge. Great nonstick surface and cooks food very well.
customer_reviews.author: wood0504

customer_reviews.title: Mostly for stir-fry
customer_reviews.text: Good product for stir-frying. Probably is more useful over a stove with fire rather than electric. My stove is electric and given the size, it takes quite a while to cook what is in the pot even with a lid over it
customer_reviews.author: Angel Ng

customer_reviews.title: Good, Economical WOK -- Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I have used this about dozen times so far and am pleased with my purchase --- It does the job and I just use a top from another skillet to cover food while cooking -- I am using bamboo utensils in it without leaving scratches It cleans up fast and requires no prep or "preseason" maintenance that the carbon steel and cast iron requires -- So I get to use it, clean it and put it away instead of spending extra time cleaning it the right way and seasoning it ... Cheap enough that if it wears in a couple years I will just replace
customer_reviews.author: J Depp

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prepping, extremely easy to clean, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: See headline! I have bought this wok before and had bought one for a secret santa for a colleague. These are the best $20 ever spent. Cleans extremely easily and is big enough to make multiple meals or just cook large portions at a time. It can be heavy for some people if you are trying to flip food, that might be only con given how big it is. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BBW

customer_reviews.title: Not just a unitasker, if you're creative
customer_reviews.text: I got these to make omelets and Japanese pizza (I have no flipping ability), but we are using them for lots more. The sloping sides are good for building sauces and the non-stick surface is durable and slick. The pans nest neatly and there is very little leakage as you turn them over. My only wish is that the set came with a regular lid, in case you wanted to use just one pan. But otherwise, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I feel it can last much longer than other non-stick woks. Will definitely buy again if this one lost its non-stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Li

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: Not an expert cook, but I can tell you that this has poor heat distribution. It takes a long time to heat up. But, once it gets going, it does a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pascual

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo nonstick wok for big meals
customer_reviews.text: Great size for cooking big meals. Bought it two years ago and so far the coating still seems good, easy to clean. The only Con is that it does not have a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I was looking for. The pan is very thin. I know that you can't put woks on super high heat but I can't get mine to stay consistently hot through out. I'm a beginner at using the wok and I cook often but even with the directions I didn't get the quality of stir fry that I was looking for. Maybe a more experienced wok user should use this, not a first timer.
customer_reviews.author: AlexM

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: This is a giant pot. I don't use it that often because I usually just don't need it. But whenever I used it, it worked very well and I enjoyed it. I just hope this pot will last.
customer_reviews.author: Natte

customer_reviews.title: What can I say -Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't cook but this wok works like it was made for rookies. I've "cooked" 3 times now and everything was great, Wouldn't know how to compare with cast iron but to me this is a great wok.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. George

customer_reviews.title: Daily use
customer_reviews.text: I use this wok to sear meat, cook stir fry, and pasta dishes. It has held up really nice with daily use. I love that it’s non stick and easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: affordable, large, and truly nonstick!
customer_reviews.text: The first couple uses the nonstick impressed me. Now I am getting up into the hundredth use and for the most part, it is still nonstick. I love the size as it allows me to cook a whole weeks worth of food in a single pan. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Wow, for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pan and for the price, wow. Cooks evenly and cleans up easy. Perfect size for a WOK. We do not use a WOK every day, so stores in kitchen cabinet. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark or Barbi

customer_reviews.title: A great starter wok
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I am new to the whole "wok" thing. I have to say, I am hooked! I didn't think a pan could make so much difference when it comes to cooking. The non-stick coating makes it a breeze to use and I don't even have to use much oil or fat when cooking. HUGE plus. It fits well on the stove and isn't ridiculously large. It fits a good amount of food for my family of 5. It is a little light and I worry about potential warping in the future, but for now it seems after 10+ uses it seems to fit well. I would definately suggest this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: J. Skasick

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had the chance to use it, but a piece was broken off of the handle upon opening the package. Exchanging for a new pot wasn’t an option when I tried to start a refund.
customer_reviews.author: April B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price -excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Great price ! Finally I have inspiration in the kitchen !! Love this Wok !
customer_reviews.author: Artsy Fartsy

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I like it. it’s really helpful for me. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN LIANG

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok. Made pad Thai in it - double batch and there was enough room for it
customer_reviews.author: Frank Versace

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight which is great and easy to clean. It's large enough to cook a meal for 3-4 people. Perfect for scranbled eggs. My only complaint so far is that I haven't figured out exactly how hot I can get the pan (the hotter the better) without ruining it. If I can figure it out, I'd call this 5 stars. 4 till then.
customer_reviews.author: Laddy D

customer_reviews.title: awesome wok. Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean no matter what youre cooking. Essential kitchen item!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wok!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to replace a wok we had purchased at our grocery store years ago. This one is larger and heavier, but the two handles make it very easy to use. Easy to clean and wipe dry. Very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: H Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Too big and heavy for a regular home stove
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, and doesn't get scratched easily, but it DOESN'T come with a lid, so make sure you have a big enough extra pan cover at home already before buying this so that you don't have wait forever when you are boiling something with this pan. Also, I found this a bit too big and heavy for a regular home-sized stove, especially for an electric one. Personally, I wouldn't recommend this pan unless you cook Wok food on one of those Chinese-style fire stove.
customer_reviews.author: U,p

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but needs better shipping. Mine came in bent but it still works. Glad it wasn't for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaPeach

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to start coming with this. Is larger than expected, but that a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Gaffney

customer_reviews.title: Super big
customer_reviews.text: It's really super big and easy to use! The only drawback is that it is too thin
customer_reviews.author: xuanjin

customer_reviews.title: Really spacious and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I got this wok because it was not very expensive and I am so happy with it. I have cooked a bunch of stir fry with it and it is very deep and wide, makes it very easy to use. Feels really nice as I move it around.
customer_reviews.author: R. Farrow

customer_reviews.title: High recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE this wok! I've been stir frying like a champ since buying it, and stuff just slide around in it like oil on ice. So far, even with heavy use, the nonstick surface seems unmarred, although I'm careful to always use silicon or wooden spatulas. Now, I just have to shop around for a suitable lid.... But, yes - if you're in the market for a low-maintenance nonstick wok, you can't go wrong with this one. Seamless, trouble-free purchase with quick delivery, too.
customer_reviews.author: S.Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Now wok it out, wok it out
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wok for the price. My wife loves making fried rice with it! The non-stick feel has been holding up for 2 weeks of constant use so far. Wok, baby, wok!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I expected but in a good way! I figured it would be smaller in circumference but deeper. Still perfect for stir-fry!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We use the wok almost every day, it doesn’t last. The coating gets destroy after couple of weeks of usages.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price...not a bad wok. Works!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, nonstick, excellent big size that replaced my old nonstick wok, works well for family size cooking, well worth it for the price and my wife is happy. I just acquired this product and looks like cheap aluminum product that won’t last long. But I guess we will see about that in a few months....this is the reason I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnyv

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for everything
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using it. After my roommate opened it. It was a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sanford S Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great wok
customer_reviews.text: We love this item! The quality seems great so far as we've only used it a few times, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: LRK

customer_reviews.title: Great wok that is large enough
customer_reviews.text: I use this wok to do my weekly meal prep. It is so big... Big enough to hold a week's amount! Plus it is extremely easy to clean: never had stuck on food. Need more time to tell if it lasts long though.
customer_reviews.author: Y Gong

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan / wok for those of us who occasionally make stir-fry. Looks good, very easy to clean. I love the smaller handle on the opposite side. It makes it easy to lift the entire pan off of the heat.
customer_reviews.author: book loving mom

product_meta.title: T-fal A80789 Specialty Nonstick Dishwasher Safe Oven Safe PFOA-Free Jumbo Wok Cookware, 14-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:NonstickPrepare delicious Asian inspired meals for the whole family with this T fal Specialty nonstick 14 inch jumbo wok. Made of durable aluminum and traditionally shaped with a wide top and narrow base, the gently curved wok heats quickly and evenly, sealing in flavor. The wok’s PFOA free nonstick (inside and out) requires the use of little to no oil or fat for healthier cooking, effortless food release, and quick, convenient cleanup. Ideal for stir frying, the versatile wok also works well for steaming, searing, sauteing, pan or deep frying, poaching, boiling, braising, making soup, or even roasting nuts. The wok’s long, stay cool handle promotes a secure grip, keeps hands a safe distance from the heat, and comes with a hole at the end for optional hanging storage. Oven safe up to 350 degrees F and dishwasher safe, the T fal Specialty nonstick 14 inch jumbo wok makes a great gift idea for anyone looking for fresh inspiration when it comes to healthy, great tasting, home cooked meals.
feature_bullets: Large capacity for cooking family size meals
Superior nonstick interior and exterior make it easy to cook and clean; Healthy cooking results with minimal oils or fat
Aluminum construction for fast and even heat distribution
Dishwasher safe; Oven safe upto 350 degrees Fahrenheit
Popular wedding gift for the couple and/or housewarming gift that friends and family can use daily
